features: Contains: 10 disposable fever thermometers for adults and kids
Sanitary: Our single-use medical thermometers are designed to combat cross-contamination
Ultra-Convenient: No batteries or cleaning supplies are required - each temperature thermometer comes ready to use out of the box and is completely disposable
Versatile: Our oral thermometers for adults and children are perfect for standalone use but can also be added to first aid kits

Personal and Professional First Aid Solutions: First Aid Only offers a full line of first aid kits, cabinets, and stations, Emergency Response Care, individual first aid products, Spill Clean Up kits, CPR care and more
body.description: Pac-Kit ten pack of disposable thermometers. Convenient unitized box fits into any first aid kit. Perfect for standalone first aid or as a refill for a kit.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: First Aid Refills Keeping your first aid kit or cabinet fully stocked is very important. First Aid Only offers a full selection of refill items to meet all your first aid needs. The individual boxes are perfectly sized for any application and can be used in both a first aid kit or as a stand-alone refill.

About Unitized Refill Boxes Feature 1: ANSI Color Guide Packaging Consistent color-coded packaging matches ANSI recommendations for easy identification when the user needs to find a first aid supply to treat an injury or know what to reorder for their kit. Feature 2: Organization Each unitized box is shrink-wrapped to keep product contained during shipping. Feature 3: Simplification Unit boxes simplify finding what you need in an emergency, as well as when you need to restock. Feature 4: Flexibility Missing a refill box in your First Aid Kit or Cabinet? The First Aid Only unitized refill boxes come in a variety of sizes to help you select the refill you need when replenishing your cabinet. The interchangeable refill boxes allow you to customize your kit or cabinet to meet the needs for a wide range of industries.

reviews.reviewText: They work well but if your using it on your own, you will need a mirror to read it, the reading disappears as soon as you take it off your forehead

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great for on the go and for those family gatherings where you may want to take a temperature without using your personal thermometer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Disposable Thermometers - A Disappointing Investment
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the First Aid Only 21-770 Disposable Thermometer for Fever in a 10 Pack, and my experience with these thermometers has been nothing short of disappointing.First and foremost, the accuracy of these disposable thermometers is questionable at best. In comparison to traditional digital or oral thermometers, the readings from these disposable ones were inconsistent and often inaccurate. This lack of reliability is a significant concern, especially when dealing with health-related matters.The construction quality is subpar. The thermometers feel flimsy and cheap, giving a sense that they may break or malfunction easily. The packaging claims they are disposable, but the fragility of these thermometers makes them feel more like single-use items, contributing to environmental concerns.Furthermore, the design is impractical. The single-use nature of these thermometers makes them less cost-effective compared to reusable alternatives. Given their unreliability, the added environmental impact of disposing of these thermometers after a single use only adds to their overall drawbacks.The packaging is also less than convenient. It lacks clear instructions and proper organization, making it cumbersome to use these thermometers in urgent situations. The lack of clarity in the packaging only adds to the frustration of dealing with a product that doesn't deliver on its promises.In conclusion, the First Aid Only 21-770 Disposable Thermometer for Fever in a 10 Pack is a regrettable purchase. The questionable accuracy, flimsy construction, and impractical design make these thermometers a poor choice for anyone seeking reliable and cost-effective temperature monitoring. I would strongly advise against purchasing this product and recommend exploring more trustworthy alternatives for accurate and consistent temperature readings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on March 16, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok for back up and emergency use, beware of the small printing, people with non standard eye sight may find it difficult
reviews.reviewText: These are ok, I would not use these unless there was nothing else and this was the best I could do.We use these as emergency back-ups just in case items.If you have issues with small print, then these will be all but useless to you unless you have a magnifying glass to see the readings

reviews.reviewText: Bring while traveling in your emergency bag!
